titles.title: Honoring Leonidas Ralph Mecham, Director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts and Secretary of the Judicial Conference of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 109-446.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 169.

bill.summary:
4/27/2006--Reported to House without amendment. Commends Leonidas Ralph Mecham for his steadfast loyalty and unwavering dedication to the judiciary and to the public.
Recognizes Mr. Mecham for his more than 20 years of outstanding public service to the federal judiciary and to the nation.
Honors him on the occasion of his retirement from the Administrative Office of the United States Courts.
